trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: Define los métodos llamados durante la generación del contrato que pueden utilizarse para modificar el código generado para un contrato de servicio.

trans-unit.source: Implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> interface on a contract behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: Implemente la interfaz <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> en un comportamiento de contrato (un tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType>) para habilitarlo y modificar el código generado cuando un contrato o extremo está compilado en el código.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> inserts a custom contract behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> personalizado inserta un comportamiento del contrato personalizado en la colección <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> durante la llamada a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra cómo agregar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> a la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> durante la llamada a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code examples show the implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> that adds comments to the code generated for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: Los ejemplos de código siguientes muestran la implementación de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> que agrega comentarios al código generado para un contrato del servicio.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the generated comments on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra los comentarios generados en el contrato del servicio.

trans-unit.source: The code generated context to use to modify the code document prior to generation.
trans-unit.target: Contexto del código generado que se utiliza para modificar el documento de código antes de la generación.

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: Implemente para modificar el Code Document Object Model antes del proceso de generación de contrato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> to modify the contract, operations, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to code generation.
trans-unit.target: Utilice <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> para modificar el contrato, las operaciones o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> antes de la generación de código.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra cómo agregar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> a la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> durante la llamada a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code examples show the implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> that adds comments to the code generated for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: Los ejemplos de código siguientes muestran la implementación de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> que agrega comentarios al código generado para un contrato del servicio.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the generated comments on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra los comentarios generados en el contrato del servicio.
